Name: Sergeant Whiskerbyte
Description: Sergeant Whiskerbyte is a tactical genius from the WebtrES club, known for his forest green exterior that blends seamlessly into the digital woodlands. This pixelated personality sports cat-shaped buttons, giving him a quirky charm that belies his disciplined demeanor. His arms and legs are modeled after a soldier's, hinting at his past in cyber defense. The classic screen face exudes a nostalgic vibe, while his stylish glasses hint at a meticulous attention to detail. Sergeant Whiskerbyte's background includes leading covert operations against malware threats and educating young coders at the WebtrES bootcamp.
